overview:
Mergim Riza is a visionary, he sees’ the future for what it can and will be. He has created a site called MrAutoList.com with the intentions of creating millions of jobs and helping hard working Americans get a vehicle. He believes that this one site can solve all of the problems that our economy is having.

MrAutoList.com is a membership based site, which allows us to purchase cars for them. The benefit being, no interest and a low monthly (membership) payment of $200. The benefit for dealerships across the country is, an untapped market, and never having to turn a buyer away again. Members will pay their dues, we will also charge dealerships, Insurance agents, and others a monthly fee to advertise there products.

For example: With funding of 2 million dollars, we will advertise our site on TV and radio ads. Members will pay a yearly registration fee of $500, within two weeks of registering we will email them a confirmation number with a dealership and insurance agent to contact. They will proceed to the dealership where they will pick out a new or used vehicle up to $15,000. Two weeks after they will have there first membership fee and every month after thatfor six years. For every 100 members we send to a dealership MrAutoList.com will payoff 5 cars per month per dealership .
